com.paperboyclone

Class AudioPlayer

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.paperboyclone.AudioPlayer
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.lang.Runnable

    public class AudioPlayer
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.lang.Runnable
    The AudioPlayer is a Singleton and responsible for playing music and sound effects while the game is running. For the music not affecting the game the Music is implemented as a Thread, therefore implements Runnable.
    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    Timo Kramer
